Prerequisite: Warpriest

As your mastery of divine magic increases, you learn to weave prayers that can bring divine objects into the world from the astral realms. Wall of shields forms a protective phalanx around you and your allies, its divine power stopping attackers in their tracks.

Level 12 Domain Utility Power (12th level)

You gain a utility power associated with your domain.

Level 12 Corellon Domain Utility Power

You gain the blessing of elvenkind power.

Level 12 Death Domain Utility Power

You gain the bound by the grave power.

Level 12 Domination Domain Utility Power

You gain the echoes of cowardice power.

Level 12 Earth Domain Utility Power

You gain the bulwark of stone power.

Level 12 Oghma Domain Utility Power

You gain the divine inspiration power.

Level 12 Selûne Domain Utility Power

You gain the dazzling light power.

Level 12 Storm Domain Utility Power

You gain the winds of victory power.

Level 12 Sun Domain Utility Power

You gain the wall of radiance power.

Level 12 Torm Domain Utility Power

You gain the rally the troops power.

Level 16 Devout Warpriest Domain Feature (16th level)

You gain a benefit associated with your domain.

Level 16 Corellon Domain Feature

When you use healing word, the target of the power becomes invisible to enemies until the start of his or her next turn.

Level 16 Death Domain Feature

Whenever you use healing word, choose one enemy within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain a power bonus to damage rolls against that enemy. The power bonus is equal to your Constitution modifier.

Level 16 Domination Domain Feature

When you use healing word, choose one enemy in the burst. Until the end of your next turn, that enemy grants combat advantage.

Level 16 Earth Domain Feature

Whenever you use healing word, you and each ally in the burst other than the target gains resist all equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn. If you are the target of healing word, you do not gain this benefit.

Level 16 Oghma Domain Feature

When you use healing word, the target of the power can make a basic attack as a free action.

Level 16 Selûne Domain Feature

When you use healing word, enemies in the burst cannot regain hit points until the end of your next turn.

Level 16 Storm Domain Feature

When you use healing word, you can slide yourself or one ally in the power's burst a number of squares up to your Constitution modifier.

Level 16 Sun Domain Feature

When you use healing word, the target of the power gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Level 16 Torm Domain Feature

When you use healing word, each ally in the burst can make a saving throw.

Level 20 Domain Daily Power (20th level)

You gain a daily attack power associated with your domain.

Level 20 Corellon Domain Daily Power

You gain the implacable enmity power.

Level 20 Death Domain Daily Power

You gain the mark of death power.

Level 20 Domination Domain Daily Power

Level 20 Earth Domain Daily Power

Level 20 Oghma Domain Daily Power

Level 20 Selûne Domain Daily Power

You gain the Heaven's Tear power.

Level 20 Storm Domain Daily Power

You gain the storm's fury power.

Level 20 Sun Domain Daily Power

You gain the solar flare power.

Level 20 Torm Domain Daily Power

You gain the peacemaker's interdiction power.

Published in Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 98.
